data.title: Nas Award in Molecular Biology Supported by the Monsanto Company
data.meta_description: Read chapter Nas Award in Molecular Biology Supported by the Monsanto Company: Award committees established by trust funds 1991....
data.text:
Below is the uncorrected machine-read text of this chapter, intended to provide our own search engines and external engines with highly rich, chapter-representative searchable text of each book. Because it is UNCORRECTED material, please consider the following text as a useful but insufficient proxy for the authoritative book pages.

OUSTERHOUT 1990 JAMES G FIUIMOTO W A Y N E H K N O X 1991 N O A M D EUOES NATIONAL A C A D E M Y O F S C I E N C E S AWARD IN MATHEMATICS* âESTABUSHED BY T H E AMERICAN MATHEMATICAL SOCIETY IN COMMEMORATION OF ITS CENTENNIAL Prize of $5,000 awarded every four years for excellence of research in the mathematical sciences published within the past ten years. RECIPIENTS: 1988 ROBERT P L A N G L A N D S NATIONAL A C A D E M Y O F SCIENCES AWARD IN M O L E C U L A R B I O L O G Y * âSUPPORTED BY T H E MONSANTO COMPANY Gold medal and prize of $20,000 presented annually for recent notable discovery in molecular biology by a young scientist Continuation of the award in molecular biology supported by the U.S. Steel (now USX) Foundation from 1961 through 1988.
